name: 2D Wizard Themed Tower Defense Game
description:
The ancient wizard wands are here to defend their territory as mystical creatures come to invade!

Place towers to defeat all enemies before they reach the bottom. You have in-game currency that you can earn by defeating enemies. Defeating the dragon, grants you 100 money. Initially, you start with enough money to buy the cheapest tower and then you can work your way to buying more.

Controls:

IMPORTANT NOTE: The game will not RUN if you begin the enemy wave without placing towers first!

Might want to also zoom out to your liking to see the whole game screen for a better experience.

Begin Enemy Wave - Space Bar

Select Tower in Shop or Select Placed Tower - Right Click

Deselect Tower - Left Click

Sell Tower - Click on Sell Icon when you click on the Placed Tower 

Upgrade Tower - Click on Upgrade Icon when you click on the Placed Tower 

Change Game Speed:

Slower - Press 1

Medium - Press 2

Faster - Press 3
